title: The Zombie Road Fan Fiction Collection: Tales from the Zombie Road World
description: These are stories from fans of the Zombie Road series. They introduce new characters, fill in backstories of old favorites and go to some of the darker areas of the post apocalyptic world. There are survivors trying to get to Lakota, children with extraordinary abilities, trains that thunder through the night and all manner of people just trying to live another day in a world overrun with the undead.Thank you for your support.
author: David A. Simpson
